name: DerpFest
changelog:
• Merged with the latest October source
  • Signed with private keys
  • Play Integrity passes by default
  • Implemented Device as Webcam
  • Fixed screen recording
  • MIUI camera module is not supported
notes:
• A dirty flash is okay if you're coming from the previous build, but clean flash is recommended.
  • Recovery build.
  • Check the group for installation guide. Clean flash mandatory.
